name: Cat Instinct
description:
WASD - to navigate

SPACE - to interact

You are a cat. Your life purpose consists of eating, pooping and sleeping.

However, your owners go to a vacation. You are in the home all alone for just 3 days. 

What can happen?

This game was intended to be scary, but then I realised it is not scary at all. Then, this game's intention is shifted to be funny, then I realised it is not funny at all too. So only phrase I can identify this game  is weird.

If HTML format takes too much time, try downloading executable instead:
